code: var uservalidation=function uservalidation(values){var errors={};if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.name)){errors.name="Name is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.address)){errors.address="Address is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.email)){errors.email="Email Id is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.dob)){errors.dob="Date of Birth is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.gender)){errors.gender="Gender is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.adhar)){errors.adhar="Aadhar No is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.photo)){errors.photo="Profile Photo is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.sign)){errors.sign="Signature is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.phone)){errors.phone="Phone no is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.pwd)){errors.pwd="Password is required";}if(!(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.cpwd)){errors.cpwd="Confirm password is required";}if(values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.pwd&&values!==null&&values!==void 0&&values.cpwd&&(values===null||values===void 0?void 0:values.pwd)!==(values===null||values===void 0?void 0:values.cpwd)){errors.cpwd="Password not match";}return errors;};export default uservalidation;
